text: Ligocki (feminine Ligocka) is a Polish surname. The "Dictionary of American Family Names" describes the origin as: It may refer to: * Mateusz Ligocki (born 1982), Polish snowboarder * Michał Ligocki (born 1985), Polish snowboarder * Paulina Ligocka (born 1984), Polish snowboarder * Roma Ligocka (born 1938), Polish costume designer ==References== Category:Polish-language surnames
title: Ligocki
